duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with Account Managers in a pre-sales technical role, showcasing Cisco product solutions, setting up demonstrations, and explaining features and benefits to customers.
Design and configure products to meet specific customer needs, using a broad palette of Cisco technologies and applications across various vertical markets.
Provide technical and sales support for accounts in assigned territory, performing technical presentations for customers, partners, and prospects.
Assist with the development of formal sales plans and proposals for assigned opportunities, and keep up-to-date on relevant competitive solutions, products, and services.
Identify an area of specialization and maintain in-depth knowledge in at least one area of concentration, such as Data Center, Collaboration, Security, Route/Switch/Wireless, or Software Development.
Keep current with technological aptitude and adopt an interpersonal, presentation, and troubleshooting skills.
Direct account and partner responsibilities for selected accounts in the assigned territory.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA (EE/CS) or equivalent. CCNA or CCNP preferred. Will require frequent travel throughout the continental United States.
